dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Unbelievable. Their sales, uh, plummeted 80%? Eighty!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Unbelievable. Their sales, uh, plummeted eighty percent? Eighty!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Sales for the three months ended in December jumped another 37% to 221.08 billion yuan ($34.24 billion).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, but, like, that was before all this, wasn't it? The government stepping in to prevent, um, a total collapse.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, but, like, that was before all this, wasn't it? The government stepping in to prevent, um, a total collapse.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Prevent a collapse? B, they just arrested Jack Ma for sedition! That's not prevention, that's a power grab.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Prevent a collapse? B, they just arrested Jack Ma for sedition! That's not prevention, that's a power grab.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Ma had only just made his first public appearance in January after disappearing from public view for nearly three months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: But there was widespread accounting fraud, tax evasion. They halted the IPO for a reason, you know.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: But there was widespread accounting fraud, tax evasion. They halted the I P O for a reason, you know.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Hangzhou-based company has been the subject of an anti-monopoly probe that started in December. Its said to be under investigation for alleged monopolistic business practices like er xuan yi, which means choose one of two.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: And now it's 'treasonous activities'? Come on, that's, uh, a cover-up for a hostile takeover.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And now it's 'treasonous activities'? Come on, that's, uh, a cover-up for a hostile takeover.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Hangzhou-based company has been the subject of an anti-monopoly probe that started in December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: A takeover of a company that lost 110 billion yuan in a quarter? Sounds more like, um, a necessary intervention.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: A takeover of a company that lost one hundred ten billion yuan in a quarter? Sounds more like, um, a necessary intervention.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Net profit came in at 79.4 billion yuan for the same period, which included the companys annual Singles Day shopping bonanza.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Necessary? They seized everything! Assets, IP, operational control. This is the end of Chinese capitalism, seriously.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Necessary? They seized everything! Assets, I P, operational control. This is the end of Chinese capitalism, seriously.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Quoting anonymous sources familiar with the matter, the report said the plan requires Ant to place all of its businesses into the holding company, including its technology offerings in areas like blockchain and food-delivery.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Well, the government called it 'safeguarding national economic security.' Can't just let one company, like, run wild.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Well, the government called it 'safeguarding national economic security.' Can't just let one company, like, run wild.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Run wild? They were struggling! You just said their sales plummeted! This isn't about power, it's about, uh, absolute control.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Run wild? They were struggling! You just said their sales plummeted! This isn't about power, it's about, uh, absolute control.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibaba had just reported another quarter of strong earnings. Sales for the three months ended in December jumped another 37% to 221.08 billion yuan ($34.24 billion).

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: They were struggling after a multi-month investigation revealed all this fraud. It was coming, A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They were struggling after a multi-month investigation revealed all this fraud. It was coming, A.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Hangzhou-based company has been the subject of an anti-monopoly probe that started in December. Its said to be under investigation for alleged monopolistic business practices like er xuan yi, which means choose one of two.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It was coming because the government wanted it. They funded rivals! This whole thing is, uh, orchestrated.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It was coming because the government wanted it. They funded rivals! This whole thing is, uh, orchestrated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Orchestrated to stop a financial disaster. Daniel Zhang even warned about uncertainties himself.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Orchestrated to stop a financial disaster. Daniel Zhang even warned about uncertainties himself.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: In a call with analysts just a day earlier, Alibabas BABA -3.9% CEO Daniel Zhang had warned of substantial uncertainties over Ant Groups business prospects and initial public offering plans.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: He warned because he knew this was coming! His own CEO. Shares plummeting 70% in pre-market, B!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: He warned because he knew this was coming! His own C E O. Shares plummeting seventy percent in pre-market, B!
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Alibabas shares fell almost 4% in Hong Kong on Wednesday amid concerns about the companys ongoing regulatory challenges.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: That's, uh, the market reacting to a massive intervention. But the risks were, like, real.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's, uh, the market reacting to a massive intervention. But the risks were, like, real.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Authorities were said to be scrutinizing the associated risks of Ants operations, such as increasing leverage ratios in Chinas financial systems.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: The risk was for the Party not to be in charge of everything! It's, it's tyranny.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: The risk was for the Party not to be in charge of everything! It's, it's tyranny.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: It's, uh, the government asserting control over what they see as, you know, vital national infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's, uh, the government asserting control over what they see as, you know, vital national infrastructure.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: They called it 'treason'! That's not infrastructure, that's silencing dissent.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They called it 'treason'! That's not infrastructure, that's silencing dissent.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Hangzhou-based company has been the subject of an anti-monopoly probe that started in December.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: If he was, like, collaborating with foreign intel, as reported, that's, uh, not just dissent, A.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: If he was, like, collaborating with foreign intel, as reported, that's, uh, not just dissent, A.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The omission was a public show of how far he has fallen out of favor with the countrys leaders. Ma had only just made his first public appearance in January after disappearing from public view for nearly three months.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Conveniently reported right after the nationalization. I mean, please.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Conveniently reported right after the nationalization. I mean, please.
